text:
Viewers may have tuned into the 2018 Billboard Music Awards for Janet Jackson, Ariana Grande, Christina Aguilera or Kelly Clarkson to name a few. But, they got bonus performances from two famous…

title: Andy Cohen and Mila Kunis Had the Best Time Ever at the 2018 Billboard Music Awards
